author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes a small fix for the RelMon pages stylesheet location (`https://cms-pdmv-prod.web.cern.ch/relmon//cms-service-reldqm/`) making it also always "global" just to be safe in case of changes in the pages location (as as happened).

As an example see:
- [old "style"](https://adiflori.web.cern.ch/adiflori/relmon_test/old/Muons.html);
- [new style](https://adiflori.web.cern.ch/adiflori/relmon_test/new/Muons.html).

![relmon_new](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/959cae0a-e468-4823-8b51-29985d8cd532)
title: Fixing `RelMon` Pages Stylesheets Locations
